message: It's hard to walk with the partiers filling the streets, not to mention the obvious security everywhere.
I head for the tower, keeping as much distance as possible from the guards on the way.
I missed them yesterday due to the crowd, but the front of the tower is crawling with security. It doesn't look like something I can break through on my own.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What now?"
I open the map on my Coil.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Do you think the tower has a back entrance?"

name: 蓮
message: "...There appears to be a service entrance opposite the main entrance."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You mean this icon? Let's check it out. The security might be lighter back there."
There's no time to waste. I head to the back of the tower.
The service entrance is dark in the shadow of the tower. There are only two guards.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I think I can take 'em."

name: 蓮
message: "I advise caution. There may be more."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Gotcha."
I reach into my bag for the stun gun Mr. Haga gave me before I left.
There's a tall flower bed next to the gate. It will serve to mask my approach.
I crouch down behind the flower bed, still my breathing, and creep toward the closest guard.

Just a little more...

Now!

name: 警備Ａ
message: "What?! ...Guh!"

name: 警備Ｂ
message: "Hey! ...Ngh!"
I knock the closest guard out with a roundhouse kick, then shove the stun gun into the neck of the second. He goes down instantly.
...Damn. This thing packs a punch. He's not dead, right?
Mr. Haga said he built it himself, so he's probably fine...

name: 蒼葉
message: "This is unreal..."

name: 蓮
message: "So are you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Me?"
Ren pops his head out as I'm groping around the chest of the second guard.

name: 蓮
message: "I didn't think you'd charge them like that."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sometimes you just gotta go for it, y'know? Fighting's all about timing and momentum... Here we go."
I pull the guard's ID card from around his neck.

name: 蒼葉
message: "This should get us in, right? Let's go."

name: 蓮
message: "...Shoot first, ask questions later?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "There's a time and a place for everything."
I take the card and run to the door.
A touch, and the door opens.
